name: Timeless / Unspecified
description: Neutral lighting without specific time indicators, timeless atmosphere

prompt.base: Timeless lighting, unspecified time of day, neutral illumination, studio-quality light, controlled atmosphere, time-neutral setting, even lighting, professional illumination
prompt.positive: timeless lighting, neutral illumination, studio quality, even lighting, controlled atmosphere, professional setup, time-neutral, balanced light, consistent illumination, no time indicators, universal lighting
prompt.negative: specific time of day, sunrise colors, sunset glow, night darkness, golden hour, dawn light, obvious time markers

variations.name: Studio Timeless
variations.modifier: professional studio, controlled lighting, photography setup, commercial quality, perfect illumination

variations.name: Overcast Timeless
variations.modifier: cloudy sky, diffused natural light, soft shadows, neutral atmosphere, even daylight

variations.name: Interior Timeless
variations.modifier: indoor setting, artificial lighting, no windows, controlled environment, time-independent

examples: A portrait with studio lighting, timeless atmosphere, neutral illumination, no time indicators
An interior scene with even lighting, time-neutral setting, controlled professional atmosphere
